# load package


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-summary="Load Pacakges & Set Options"}
library(themis)
library(tidyverse)      
library(tidymodels)     
library(palmerpenguins) # penguin dataset
library(gt)             # better tables
library(bonsai)         # tree-based models
library(conflicted)     # function conflicts
library(vetiver)
library(Microsoft365R)
library(pins)
tidymodels_prefer()     # handle conflicts
conflict_prefer("penguins", "palmerpenguins")
options(tidymodels.dark = TRUE) # dark mode
theme_set(theme_bw()) # set default ggplot2 theme
```
:::


# data preparation

## read data



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
train = read_csv("data/train.csv")

test=read_csv("data/test.csv")
```
:::

# model result

## Evaluate


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
results_train <- lm_fit %>%
  predict(new_data = data_train) %>%
  mutate(
    truth = data_train$target_variable,
    model = "lm"
  ) %>%
  bind_rows(rf_fit %>%
    predict(new_data = data_train) %>%
    mutate(
      truth = data_train$target_variable,
      model = "rf"
    )) %>%
  bind_rows(lasso_fit %>%
    predict(new_data = data_train) %>%
    mutate(
      truth = data_train$target_variable,
      model = "lasso"
    ))


results_test <- lm_fit %>%
  predict(new_data = data_test) %>%
  mutate(
    truth = data_test$target_variable,
    model = "lm"
  ) %>%
  bind_rows(rf_fit %>%
    predict(new_data = data_test) %>%
    mutate(
      truth = data_test$target_variable,
      model = "rf"
    ))%>%
  bind_rows(lasso_fit %>%
    predict(new_data = data_test) %>%
    mutate(
      truth = data_test$target_variable,
      model = "lasso"
    ))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
results_train %>%
  group_by(model) %>%
  rmse(truth = truth, estimate = .pred)
```

## resample with rf model

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(1234)

```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
rf_res <- lm_spec %>% fit_resamples(
  target_variable ~ .,
  folds,
  control = control_resamples(save_pred = TRUE)
)
```
